DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether tailor internet-administrated cognitive behaviour therapy ( CBT ) feasible approach treatment depressive symptom comorbid anxiety symptom .
DOC.brief_title: Internet-Delivered Cognitive Behaviour Therapy Adolescent Depression
DOC.criteria: Be age 1519 year old Have symptoms depression , major depression Suicidal ideation Alcohol addiction major primary psychiatric disorder Ongoing psychological treatment recent ( last 4 week ) change psychiatric medication
